name: Commit Completed Task
description: Manually commit changes to git with a message based on the most recently completed task

action.prompt: Please examine the current task file and identify the most recently completed task (marked with [x]). Then commit all current changes to git with a descriptive commit message based on that completed task title. The commit message should be in the format: 'Complete: [task title]' or 'Implement: [task title]' as appropriate. Make sure to add all changed files to the commit.
